description: The head of the European Commission says the EU's first priority is to keep order on Greece's border.
title: EU chief says Greece is Europe's shield in migrant crisis
title_page: EU chief says Greece is Europe's shield in migrant crisis - BBC News
maintext: "This border is not only a Greek border but it is also a European border and I stand here today as a European at your side... We have come here today to send a very clear statement of European solidarity and support to Greece...
